OOC: Kilt wearing dog? So you want a fight with Connor MacLeod in the
Highlander rpg? So be it?

::Hot Rod::

He was confused. How could this onw be from before the Cybertron
Revolutionary war(Or First Cybertronian war.)? Those were the times
before Cybertrons became Transformers. Back in the time of Alpha
Trion(Or A3 as he was known then.) And Predicons in the second Great
War? He only knew of the Decepticon gestalt group known as Predicons.

His kick made contacct with Unitron's block. He pushed off, back
flipping to his feet. He then ducked, and sent a punch for Unitron's mid
section.
